meanings.definition: A protein that is similar to collagen and is the chief constituent of elastic fibers.
meanings.sent1: Elastin helps our skin and tissues stretch and bounce back.
meanings.sent2: The elastin in our body gives our skin its flexibility and resilience.
meanings.sent3: When the elastin in my body works hard, I feel like a rubber band!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong and flexible as elastin in the face of challenges.
meanings.sent5: The importance of elastin in our bodies is like the foundation of a strong building.
